description.value: Most lashuntas have the ability to cast minor spells, even if they havenâ€™t formally studied spellcasting. With tiny attuned crystals or magically aligned plates in your palms, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.cmD9XPyg0Cud1xYO]{Daze} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.byAI5MUa3DgiiXc9]{Psychokinetic Hand} at will and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.moyeAHT4yzZVWmmg]{Detect Thoughts} once per day as spell-like abilities. The caster level for these effects is equal to your level.
